name: Cooked Porkchop
description: A cooked piece of pork that restores hunger.

name: Golden Apple
description: An apple coated with gold, offering enhanced regeneration.

name: Rotten Flesh
description: A disgusting food item often dropped by zombies.

name: Pufferfish
description: A dangerous fish that can be used to make potions of Water Breathing or as food.

name: Raw Rabbit
description: Raw meat from a rabbit, can be cooked for better healing.

name: Rabbit Stew
description: A hearty stew made with rabbit, carrots, and other ingredients.

name: Cooked Rabbit
description: Cooked rabbit that restores hunger and provides some saturation.

name: Raw Mutton
description: Uncooked mutton from sheep, can be cooked for better food value.

name: Cooked Mutton
description: Cooked mutton from sheep, restores more hunger than raw.

name: Raw Rabbit
description: An updated version of raw rabbit, used in cooking recipes.

name: Cooked Rabbit
description: An updated version of cooked rabbit, commonly used for food.

name: Raw Mutton
description: An updated version of raw mutton, can be cooked to restore hunger.

name: Cooked Mutton
description: An updated version of cooked mutton, restores hunger more effectively.

name: Beetroot Soup
description: A bowl of beetroot soup, a quick snack that restores a little hunger.

name: Beetroot
description: Raw beetroot, can be eaten directly or used in crafting beetroot soup.

name: Raw Cod
description: Raw fish from cod, can be cooked to restore hunger.

name: Raw Salmon
description: Raw salmon, can be eaten or cooked for a better food source.

name: Tropical Fish
description: A colorful tropical fish, can be used in crafting or eaten.

name: Cooked Cod
description: Cooked cod, restores hunger and saturation.

name: Cooked Salmon
description: Cooked salmon, one of the best fish to restore hunger.
